item.description:
Hi everyone, well after much talk of a BBQ to get us all together I have decided on a date and now it is up to you. Please feel free to bring new friends you have made here in the states and I hope that after a bit of Aussie and American food we will have a great day. Maybe we should play drinking games and see how many americans we can get to eat vegemite. Ok I looke forward to meeting you all. Please RSVP as soon as you can.Thanks
P.S BYO...

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: BBQ for the aussies
